S.FORM: Alang Truwan Nasi saw nkari SeydangＷasaw ga Truwan o kika nniqan pusu rudan ta.
Alang Trowan Nasi saw nkari SeydangＷasaw ga Trowan o kika nniqan poso rodan ta.
